CustomField.description: This determines how the numbering for the questions in this section should be applied. The options are continue numbering from previous section, restart numbering in this section or don't show any numbers for this section.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This determines how the numbering for the questions in this section should be applied. The options are continue numbering from previous section, restart numbering in this section or don't show any numbers for this section.
CustomField.label: Section Numbering
